00057 #define KX_POLYGONMATERIAL_CAPSULE_ID "KX_POLYGONMATERIAL_PTR"

00059 KX_PolygonMaterial::KX_PolygonMaterial()
00060         : PyObjectPlus(),
00061           RAS_IPolyMaterial(),
00062 
00063     m_material(NULL),
00064 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00065     m_pymaterial(NULL),
00066 #endif
00067     m_pass(0)
00068 {
00069     memset(&m_tface, 0, sizeof(m_tface));
00070     memset(&m_mcol, 0, sizeof(m_mcol));
00071 }
00072 
00073 void KX_PolygonMaterial::Initialize(
00074         const STR_String &texname,
00075         Material* ma,
00076         int materialindex,
00077         int tile,
00078         int tilexrep,
00079         int tileyrep,
00080         int alphablend,
00081         bool alpha,
00082         bool zsort,
00083         bool light,
00084         int lightlayer,
00085         struct MTFace* tface,
00086         unsigned int* mcol)
00087 {
00088     RAS_IPolyMaterial::Initialize(
00089                             texname,
00090                             ma?ma->id.name:"",
00091                             materialindex,
00092                             tile,
00093                             tilexrep,
00094                             tileyrep,
00095                             alphablend,
00096                             alpha,
00097                             zsort,
00098                             light,
00099                             (texname && texname != ""?true:false), /* if we have a texture we have image */
00100                             ma?&ma->game:NULL);
00101 
00102     if (tface) {
00103         m_tface = *tface;
00104     }
00105     else {
00106         memset(&m_tface, 0, sizeof(m_tface));
00107     }
00108     if (mcol) {
00109         m_mcol = *mcol;
00110     }
00111     else {
00112         memset(&m_mcol, 0, sizeof(m_mcol));
00113     }
00114 
00115     m_material = ma;
00116 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00117     m_pymaterial = 0;
00118 #endif
00119     m_pass = 0;
00120 }
00121 
00122 KX_PolygonMaterial::~KX_PolygonMaterial()
00123 {
00124 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00125     if (m_pymaterial)
00126     {
00127         Py_DECREF(m_pymaterial);
00128     }
00129 #endif // WITH_PYTHON
00130 }
00131 
00132 Image *KX_PolygonMaterial::GetBlenderImage() const
00133 {
00134     return m_tface.tpage;
00135 }
00136 
00137 bool KX_PolygonMaterial::Activate(RAS_IRasterizer* rasty, TCachingInfo& cachingInfo) const 
00138 {
00139     bool dopass = false;
00140 
00141 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00142     if (m_pymaterial)
00143     {
00144         PyObject *pyRasty = PyCapsule_New((void*)rasty, KX_POLYGONMATERIAL_CAPSULE_ID, NULL);   /* new reference */
00145         PyObject *pyCachingInfo = PyCapsule_New((void*) &cachingInfo, KX_POLYGONMATERIAL_CAPSULE_ID, NULL); /* new reference */
00146         PyObject *ret = PyObject_CallMethod(m_pymaterial, (char *)"activate", (char *)"(NNO)", pyRasty, pyCachingInfo, (PyObject*) this->m_proxy);
00147         if (ret)
00148         {
00149             bool value = PyLong_AsSsize_t(ret);
00150             Py_DECREF(ret);
00151             dopass = value;
00152         }
00153         else
00154         {
00155             PyErr_Print();
00156             PyErr_Clear();
00157             PySys_SetObject( (char *)"last_traceback", NULL);
00158         }
00159     }
00160     else
00161 #endif // WITH_PYTHON
00162     {
00163         switch (m_pass++)
00164         {
00165             case 0:
00166                 DefaultActivate(rasty, cachingInfo);
00167                 dopass = true;
00168                 break;
00169             default:
00170                 m_pass = 0;
00171                 dopass = false;
00172                 break;
00173         }
00174     }
00175     
00176     return dopass;
00177 }
00178 
00179 void KX_PolygonMaterial::DefaultActivate(RAS_IRasterizer* rasty, TCachingInfo& cachingInfo) const 
00180 {
00181     if (GetCachingInfo() != cachingInfo)
00182     {
00183         if (!cachingInfo)
00184             GPU_set_tpage(NULL, 0, 0);
00185 
00186         cachingInfo = GetCachingInfo();
00187 
00188         if ((m_drawingmode & RAS_IRasterizer::KX_TEX)&& (rasty->GetDrawingMode() == RAS_IRasterizer::KX_TEXTURED))
00189         {
00190             Image *ima = m_tface.tpage;
00191             GPU_update_image_time(ima, rasty->GetTime());
00192             GPU_set_tpage(&m_tface, 1, m_alphablend);
00193         }
00194         else
00195             GPU_set_tpage(NULL, 0, 0);
00196         
00197         if (m_drawingmode & RAS_IRasterizer::KX_BACKCULL)
00198             rasty->SetCullFace(true);
00199         else
00200             rasty->SetCullFace(false);
00201 
00202         if ((m_drawingmode & RAS_IRasterizer::KX_LINES) ||
00203                 (rasty->GetDrawingMode() <= RAS_IRasterizer::KX_WIREFRAME))
00204             rasty->SetLines(true);
00205         else
00206             rasty->SetLines(false);
00207         rasty->SetSpecularity(m_specular[0],m_specular[1],m_specular[2],m_specularity);
00208         rasty->SetShinyness(m_shininess);
00209         rasty->SetDiffuse(m_diffuse[0], m_diffuse[1],m_diffuse[2], 1.0);
00210         if (m_material)
00211             rasty->SetPolygonOffset(-m_material->zoffs, 0.0);
00212     }
00213 
00214     //rasty->SetSpecularity(m_specular[0],m_specular[1],m_specular[2],m_specularity);
00215     //rasty->SetShinyness(m_shininess);
00216     //rasty->SetDiffuse(m_diffuse[0], m_diffuse[1],m_diffuse[2], 1.0);
00217     //if (m_material)
00218     //  rasty->SetPolygonOffset(-m_material->zoffs, 0.0);
00219 }
00220 
00221 void KX_PolygonMaterial::GetMaterialRGBAColor(unsigned char *rgba) const
00222 {
00223     if (m_material) {
00224         *rgba++ = (unsigned char) (m_material->r*255.0);
00225         *rgba++ = (unsigned char) (m_material->g*255.0);
00226         *rgba++ = (unsigned char) (m_material->b*255.0);
00227         *rgba++ = (unsigned char) (m_material->alpha*255.0);
00228     } else
00229         RAS_IPolyMaterial::GetMaterialRGBAColor(rgba);
00230 }

00296 KX_PYMETHODDEF_DOC(KX_PolygonMaterial, setCustomMaterial, "setCustomMaterial(material)")
00297 {
00298     PyObject *material;
00299     if (PyArg_ParseTuple(args, "O:setCustomMaterial", &material))
00300     {
00301         if (m_pymaterial) {
00302             Py_DECREF(m_pymaterial);
00303         }
00304         m_pymaterial = material;
00305         Py_INCREF(m_pymaterial);
00306         Py_RETURN_NONE;
00307     }
00308     
00309     return NULL;
00310 }
00311 
00312 KX_PYMETHODDEF_DOC(KX_PolygonMaterial, updateTexture, "updateTexture(tface, rasty)")
00313 {
00314     PyObject *pyrasty, *pytface;
00315     if (PyArg_ParseTuple(args, "O!O!:updateTexture", &PyCapsule_Type, &pytface, &PyCapsule_Type, &pyrasty))
00316     {
00317         MTFace *tface = (MTFace*) PyCapsule_GetPointer(pytface, KX_POLYGONMATERIAL_CAPSULE_ID);
00318         RAS_IRasterizer *rasty = (RAS_IRasterizer*) PyCapsule_GetPointer(pyrasty, KX_POLYGONMATERIAL_CAPSULE_ID);
00319         Image *ima = (Image*)tface->tpage;
00320         GPU_update_image_time(ima, rasty->GetTime());
00321 
00322         Py_RETURN_NONE;
00323     }
00324     
00325     return NULL;
00326 }
00327 
00328 KX_PYMETHODDEF_DOC(KX_PolygonMaterial, setTexture, "setTexture(tface)")
00329 {
00330     PyObject *pytface;
00331     if (PyArg_ParseTuple(args, "O!:setTexture", &PyCapsule_Type, &pytface))
00332     {
00333         MTFace *tface = (MTFace*) PyCapsule_GetPointer(pytface, KX_POLYGONMATERIAL_CAPSULE_ID);
00334         GPU_set_tpage(tface, 1, m_alphablend);
00335         Py_RETURN_NONE;
00336     }
00337     
00338     return NULL;
00339 }
00340 
00341 KX_PYMETHODDEF_DOC(KX_PolygonMaterial, activate, "activate(rasty, cachingInfo)")
00342 {
00343     PyObject *pyrasty, *pyCachingInfo;
00344     if (PyArg_ParseTuple(args, "O!O!:activate", &PyCapsule_Type, &pyrasty, &PyCapsule_Type, &pyCachingInfo))
00345     {
00346         RAS_IRasterizer *rasty = static_cast<RAS_IRasterizer*>(PyCapsule_GetPointer(pyrasty, KX_POLYGONMATERIAL_CAPSULE_ID));
00347         TCachingInfo *cachingInfo = static_cast<TCachingInfo*>(PyCapsule_GetPointer(pyCachingInfo, KX_POLYGONMATERIAL_CAPSULE_ID));
00348         if (rasty && cachingInfo)
00349         {
00350             DefaultActivate(rasty, *cachingInfo);
00351             Py_RETURN_NONE;
00352         }
00353     }
00354     
00355     return NULL;
00356 }

00377 PyObject* KX_PolygonMaterial::pyattr_get_gl_texture(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00378 {
00379     KX_PolygonMaterial* self= static_cast<KX_PolygonMaterial*>(self_v);
00380     int bindcode= 0;
00381     if (self->m_tface.tpage)
00382         bindcode= self->m_tface.tpage->bindcode;
00383     
00384     return PyLong_FromSsize_t(bindcode);
00385 }

00394 int KX_PolygonMaterial::pyattr_set_diffuse(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef, PyObject *value)
00395 {
00396     KX_PolygonMaterial* self= static_cast<KX_PolygonMaterial*>(self_v);
00397     MT_Vector3 vec;
00398     
00399     if (!PyVecTo(value, vec))
00400         return PY_SET_ATTR_FAIL;
00401     
00402     self->m_diffuse= vec;
00403     return PY_SET_ATTR_SUCCESS;
00404 }

00412 int KX_PolygonMaterial::pyattr_set_specular(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef, PyObject *value)
00413 {
